Title: Sanctuary
Plot: The hockey game rematch between the NYPD and the FDNY is right around the corner and Tommy must figure out a plan to save himself from being pummeled by the cops who have it out for him. Tommy's relationship with Sheila is discovered by the guys and they must adhere to tradition to handle it in their own way. When Tommy is visited by his demons during a fire, Franco comes to his aid... with devastating results.
GuestStars: Callie Thorne,  Tony Cox,  Idina Menzel,  Rob Leo Roy,  Cameron Neely,  Lyndon L. Byers,  Todd Carroll,  Larry Magee,  Stephen Singer,  James Andrew O'Connor,  Niels Jorgensen,  Jeffrey V. Thompson,  Jarah,  Mack
